name: Rise of the Karens
description:
Windows Smart Screen might flag the game because I am not a verified publisher. If your computer is not 64 bit, you will have to download the 32 bit version. Vice versa. Otherwise, it will crash.

This game is still in early development. New gameplay mechanics, maps, and functionality are still being added.

This game is very simple!

You are placed inside a shop, there are stands in which you can retrieve items from. The stands have a limited stock and take time to replenish.
You take items that the Karens or shoppers request. If you fail to give the Karens the correct item in time, you loose a set rating amount. If you give them the correct item in time you will gain rating. If you do not make your quota before time runs out you're fired!
